content.text: 3 ounces reduced fat cream cheese, softened
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "3 ounces reduced fat cream cheese, softened" )
( ing-4 "3 cups shredded reduced-fat Cheddar cheese" )

content.text: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry" )

content.text: 1 cup frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and well drained
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 cup frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and well drained" )

content.text: 0) In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese.
1) Add milk, egg substitute and pepper; beat until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "milk"@7:11 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "egg substitute"@13:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "pepper"@32:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "beat"@40:44 / AC
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until smooth"@45:57 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "remaining ingredients"@11:32 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-4 )
			:ref ( ing-5 )
			:ref ( ing-6 )
			:ref ( ing-7 )
			:ref ( ing-8 )
		)
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Add the mixture to a quiche pan coated with nonstick cooking spray.
4) Bake at 350 degrees F for 45-50 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "350 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "45-50 minutes"@29:42 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean"@46:100 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
